Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Currently \Cur"rent*ly\, adv. In a current manner; generally; commonly; as, it is currently believed. [1913 Webster]
currently adv : at this time or period; now; "he is presently our ambassador to the United Nations"; "currently they live in Connecticut" [syn: {presently}]
